wikipedia_page.main: Jeremy Norman Henry (born 1974) is a former Irish and current Australian lawn and indoor bowler born in Northern Ireland.

link_mentions.page: List of Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls

response: Donnelly secured a silver medal in the fours at the 2000 World Outdoor Bowls Championship before competing in the 2002 Commonwealth Games bowls singles after receiving a late call up as an injury replacement. He took a surprise gold medal defeating Jeremy Henry in the final.
